## hpr2880 :: Evaluating a Study

 We take the ideas we have developed over the previous episodes and use them to evaluate a a study I found online. These are things anyone can do with just a little work on Google, and the payoff is to have a good idea of whether or not you are looking at a quality study
Links

https://www.medicalnewstoday.com/
https://www.medicalnewstoday.com/articles/324558.php
https://mediabiasfactcheck.com/medical-news-today/
https://www.quora.com/How-can-I-find-a-replication-of-a-study
https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_of_Science
https://www.nature.com/articles/s41551-019-0356-9#MOESM1
https://www.nature.com/natbiomedeng/
https://www.nature.com/articles/s41551-019-0356-9
https://www.palain.com/?page_id=404
